MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: The mapping moves and Upsert the data records from Source Business_Seg_hierarchy_samba_vw to Target Fcst_business_seg_hierachy
MAPPING.NAME: m_FCST_BUS_SEG_HRCY

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Lookup transformation reads the target table to check if the record already exists.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_FCST_BUS_SEG_HRCY

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT FCST_BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID as BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID FROM FCST_BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY FCST_BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Source Qualifer fetches data from source table Business_seg_Hierarchy_samba_vw
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_SAMBA_VW

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT A.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID, A.STRATEGIC_BUSINESS_UNIT_DESC, A.BUSINESS_SEG_DESC, A.REPORTING_SORT_ORDER, A.BUSINESS_SEG_ORDER, A.SBU_DIVISION_GROUP_ID, A.SBU_DIVISION_GROUP_DESC, A.SBU_DIVISION_GROUP_SORT, A.BUSINESS_SEG_GROUP_ID, A.BUSINESS_SEG_GROUP_DESC, A.BUSINESS_SEG_GROUP_SORT, A.OPERATOR, A.CURRENCY , B.SBU_DIVISION_SUBGROUP_ID, A.SBU_DIVISION_SUBGROUP_DESC, A.SBU_DIVISION_SUBGROUP_SORT, A.SBU_ALT_BUS_GROUPING_ID, A.SBU_ALT_BUS_GROUPING_DESC, A.SBU_ALT_BUS_GROUPING_SORT FROM BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_SAMBA_VW A left join SBU_DIVISION_SUBGROUP B ON B.sbu_division_subgroup_desc = A.sbu_division_subgroup_desc
